mapper.select: SELECT fao.asset_id as "assetId", (SELECT asset_name FROM fintics_asset WHERE asset_id = fao.asset_id) as "assetName", fao.type as "type", fao.min_date_time as "minDateTime", fao.max_date_time as "maxDateTime", fao.total_count as "totalCount", faoi.interpolated_min_date_time as "interpolatedMinDateTime", faoi.interpolated_max_date_time as "interpolatedMaxDateTime", faoi.interpolated_count as "interpolatedCount", fta.used_by_trade as "usedByTrade" FROM ( -- all SELECT asset_id, type, MIN(date_time) as min_date_time, MAX(date_time) as max_date_time, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM fintics_asset_ohlcv WHERE type = #{type} GROUP BY asset_id, type ) as fao LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- interpolated SELECT asset_id, type, MIN(date_time) as interpolated_min_date_time, MAX(date_time) as interpolated_max_date_time, COUNT(*) as interpolated_count FROM fintics_asset_ohlcv fao WHERE type = #{type} AND interpolated = 'Y' GROUP BY asset_id, type ) as faoi ON faoi.asset_id = fao.asset_id and faoi.type = fao.type LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT asset_id, true as used_by_trade FROM fintics_trade_asset fta ) as fta ON fta.asset_id = fao.asset_id

SELECT fio.indice_id as "indiceId", fio.type as "type", fio.min_date_time as "minDateTime", fio.max_date_time as "maxDateTime", fio.total_count as "totalCount", fioi.interpolated_min_date_time as "interpolatedMinDateTime", fioi.interpolated_max_date_time as "interpolatedMaxDateTime", fioi.interpolated_count as "interpolatedCount" FROM ( -- all SELECT indice_id, type, MIN(date_time) as min_date_time, MAX(date_time) as max_date_time, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM fintics_indice_ohlcv WHERE type = #{type} GROUP BY indice_id, type ) as fio LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- interpolated SELECT indice_id, type, MIN(date_time) as interpolated_min_date_time, MAX(date_time) as interpolated_max_date_time, COUNT(*) as interpolated_count FROM fintics_indice_ohlcv fao WHERE type = #{type} AND interpolated = 'Y' GROUP BY indice_id, type ) as fioi ON fioi.indice_id = fio.indice_id and fioi.type = fio.type
